Package step.framework.service

Interface Summary
Transaction This is the Framework's transaction interface.
TransactionManager This is the Framework's transaction manager interface.
 

Class Summary
LocalService<R> Local services execute on a local transaction.
LocalTransaction A local transaction manages the local persistence's layer transaction mechanisms.
LocalTransactionManager The Local Transaction manager is a factory for new local transactions.
NullTransaction A null transaction provides an empty implementation of the transaction interface.
NullTransactionManager The Null Transaction manager is a factory for null transactions.
Service<R> This is the Framework's base service.
ServiceTest This is the Framework's base service test.
TransactionManagerFactory The Transaction Manager Factory is the access point for existing transaction managers.
